attributes.action: seek the approval of HM the Queen, to institute a National Service Medal, for all former members of the armed forces, who comopleted a minimu period of 3 months in the service of their country, to receive a medal(official)which they can wear with pride.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Many men and women have completed periods of time, in the armed service of the crown, but have no medal to show it.  The Veterans badge, is not sufficient.
